mapper.insert: insert into user (conimal_idx, user_idx, name, conimal_type, conimal_image, image_path, image_size, weight, reg_date, update_date) values (#{conimal_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{name}, #{conimal_type}, #{conimal_image}, #{image_path}, #{image_size}, #{weight}, #{reg_date}, null)
mapper.select: select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS * from community inner join user on community.user_idx = user.user_idx order by community.community_idx desc limit #{start_idx}, #{contentPerPage}
mapper.update: update user set user_key = #{user_key} where user_id = #{user_id}
update user set user_key = 'Y' where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from user where user_id = #{user_id} and password = #{password}
